entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending late in the evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wet flurries over higher terrain. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 15 April 2023
